content: For many years I wrote on assignment from editors, so my main challenge was in coming up with a great hook for article. Not too difficult if I could get over my perfectionism and procrastination and get the sucker written by deadline. Or I would propose a topic to cover or a person to profile, again with hook built in. That was the easy part. When I began writing on my own, I had to find a way to keep inspiring myself and producing a polished product. Your approach makes sense, Jeff. It’s boots on the ground taking one step at a time. Thanks!
